techmeme.title: Source: Trump plans to instruct the Commerce Department to launch a Section 232 national security probe into chip imports, which could lead to new tariffs (Ari Hawkins/Politico)
Jack Dorsey says "delete all IP law" in an X post and Musk says "I agree"; Dorsey says current models "take way too much" from creators and "only rent-seek" (Anthony Ha/TechCrunch)
US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick says consumer electronics exempt from tariffs may be included in semiconductor tariffs likely coming in "a month or two" (Financial Times)
Sources: Apple is working on a lighter and cheaper Vision Pro and a Mac-tethered model with ultra-low latency; iPadOS 19 overhaul will make it more like macOS (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
A look at Bitcoin Commons, a coworking hub in Austin where ex-staffers of companies like Apple are building crypto startups, as Trump rolls back regulations (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
